title: What famous dinosaurs were alive during the Jurassic period? - Quora

response.answer_text: Archaeopteryx was alive during the late Jurassic, which is incredibly cool when you think about the fact that theropod dinosaurs had been evolving into to Avialea for millions of years by that point. I grew up during the time period where all the easily accessible information about dinosaurs said that they were cold blooded reptiles who failed to adapt. The first really good book I read about dinosaurs was Robert Bakker's, The Dinosaur Heresies in the late 80's. Old news now, but exciting and eye opening at the time. Dilophosaurs & Compsognathus (in the original Jurassic Park book, which isn't accurate but was a great read) were alive then as well.

Allosaurus is a perfect example. So is Diplodocus. Jurassic as an age symbolized an explosion in the number of species  of dinosaurs. It is true, however, that most dinosaurs popular today were around during the Creataceous.
